import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update inventory actions by IDs"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/inventory/actions/ids/update"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates multiple inventory actions by their unique identifiers, allowing different update values for each action.

**Note**: This API is marked as deprecated (v1.0).

**Use Case**: Useful when you need to update multiple actions with different values (e.g., different quantities or costs for each).

**Prerequisites**:
- **InventoryActionIds**: Use [POST /api/v1.0/inventory/actions/query](/docs/api/inventory/query-inventory-actions) to find existing actions

**Workflow**:
1. Query actions to find records requiring updates
2. Prepare an array with each action's `InventoryActionId` and new values
3. Submit the batch update request

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Array of inventory actions with their IDs and update values.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Request body for creating or updating an inventory action. Contains all fields from the InventoryAction model.","properties":{"InventoryActionId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier of the action (required for updates, generated on create)."},"GroupKey":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Optional key for grouping related actions together."},"InventoryActionTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier describing the type of action."},"InventoryId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the stock entry to affect."},"RelatedEntityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Identifier describing the related entity type."},"RelatedEntityId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Identifier of the related entity (e.g., ticket)."},"ActionDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the action occurred."},"Quantity":{"type":"integer","description":"Quantity delta to apply (negative for consumption, positive for addition)."},"UnitCost":{"type":"number","format":"double","description":"Unit cost recorded for the transaction."},"Description":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Optional description or notes about the action."}},"title":"UpdateInventoryActionRequest"}},"example":[{"InventoryActionId":"fc45a960-d0f5-42a8-ac25-075e46f70074","Quantity":-3,"UnitCost":38},{"InventoryActionId":"bd56b071-e1f6-53b9-bd36-186f57f81185","Quantity":-1,"UnitCost":15.5}]}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Inventory actions updated successfully.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response envelope for batch updating inventory actions.","allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Response envelope returned after successfully updating multiple resources in bulk. Based on C# `ListUpdateResponse<T>` from `Spark.Shared.Models.Responses`.","properties":{"Ids":{"type":"array","description":"Array of UUIDs for the updated resources","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"Items":{"type":"array","description":"Array of updated entities (when returned)","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":true}},"UserToken":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Authenticated session identifier"},"RequestDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the API processed the request"},"ExecutionTime":{"type":"number","format":"double","description":"Server-side execution time in milliseconds"},"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code (typically 200 for successful update)","example":200},"Message":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Optional informational message"},"ServerName":{"type":"string","description":"Application node that processed the request"},"ProcessId":{"type":"integer","description":"Internal process identifier for diagnostics"},"OperationId":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Trace identifier for log correlation"}},"required":["StatusCode"],"title":"ListUpdateResponse"}],"properties":{"Ids":{"type":"array","description":"Array of InventoryActionIds that were updated.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}},"title":"InventoryActionBatchUpdateResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
